        public static java.util.HashMap<User,java.lang.Integer> getIndividualUsage(java.lang.String startDate,
                                                                           java.lang.String endDate,

        Retrieve a HashMap represents a specific user and his/her total app usage duration given the start date and end date
        Parameters:
        startDate - start date to retrieve data
        endDate - end date to retrieve data
        conn - the Connection Object passed in for sql statement
        Returns:
